reviews.review_msg: Although she can be somewhat disorganized and provide more information than necessary, she is extremely knowledgeable.  I have found that only students who do poorly in her class don't like her so I don't know how valid that opinion is. She is super helpful.  She even helps students after they've graduated!  Welcomes criticism about class.
Why is she a prof? Disorganized, confusing lectures, unfair marking, prententious attitude, she must be the worse lecturer I have ever had.

gaelle is passionate about linguistics. although her she talks very fast, i adjusted to her speed as time went on. she is a harder prof but i recommend her b/c she prepares you better for 370. she can be a bit confusing at times but i think it's becuase some of the material is very confusing. be prepared to learn the linguistics alphabet onyour own
